title: A 1,2-meter pond was dug in a barren lawn to attract wildlife; in eight months, it had become an ecosystem with a meadow of native flowers and an observation shelter, survived a hailstorm, and was free of mosquito larvae. - CPG Click Petróleo e Gás
description: A 1,2-meter pond was dug in a barren lawn to attract wildlife; in eight months, it had become an ecosystem with a meadow of native flowers and an observation shelter, survived a hailstorm, and was free of mosquito larvae.  CPG Click Petróleo e GásA 0,6 m deep pond was dug in a lawn for amphibians; within weeks, it received five egg masses of wood frogs, gained branches and leaves as a nursery, native grasses on its edge, and became a source of mud for swallow nests  CPG Click Petróleo e GásA 0.6 m deep pond was dug in a lawn for amphibians; within weeks, it received five egg masses of wood frogs, gained branches and leaves as a nursery, native grasses on its edge, and became a source of mud for swallows' nests  secom.esA temporary pond, devoid of fish, built in mud to attract amphibians, bursts with life in its first year: tree frogs and toads appear, dragonflies dominate, rare birds hunt, foxes visit, and the water stubbornly refuses to dry up completely.  CPG Click Petróleo e GásHe transformed a lifeless lawn into a wild ecosystem, attracting birds, amphibians, and predators, recording births, hunts, and the natural balance emerging in just eight months with a hand-built lake.  CPG Click Petróleo e Gás
